key.name: notifications
key.description: Set to True to enable notifications of downloads and uploads.

key.name: logfile
key.description: Absolute path to log file to use. If empty the default file in the application directory will be used if logging is enabled

key.name: minimize-to-tray
key.description: If True minimizing the application hides it to the tray

key.name: enable-logging
key.description: If True various events will be written to the log file.

key.name: query-timeout
key.description: Number of seconds a HTTP query can be pending before it's aborted

key.name: window-width
key.description: The width of the window. The window width will be set to this value upon start.

key.name: window-height
key.description: The height of the window. The window height will be set to this value upon start.

key.name: window-left
key.description: The x-position of the window. The window x-position will be set to this value upon start.

key.name: window-top
key.description: The y-position of the window. The window y-position will be set to this value upon start.
